title: Rebecca Traister, Tiffany Cabán, and 16 Votes
description:
Tiffany Cabán’s outsider campaign for Queens district attorney could come down to just 16 votes. But Rebecca Traister says this race was thrilling long before it came down to an election night dead heat. 
On this week’s show, she talks to Tiffany, and tells us what’s made her candidacy so exciting—and why it matters way beyond Queens.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
